_comment: STIG Check Configuration File - WebLogic Server 12c
_instructions: Customize this file for your organization's approved values

approved_protocols._comment: List only encrypted/secure protocols approved by your organization

approved_ports._comment: List only SSL/TLS ports. Standard: 7002 (SSL admin), 9002 (SSL managed)

unauthorized_protocols._comment: Protocols that should NOT be in use (will trigger findings if detected)

unauthorized_ports._comment: Non-SSL ports that should NOT be in use

approved_cipher_suites._comment: TLS cipher suites approved by your organization (NIST/NSA Suite B recommended)

unauthorized_cipher_suites._comment: Weak/deprecated cipher suites that should NOT be allowed

authorized_users._comment: List all users authorized to access WebLogic (for general access checks)
authorized_users._instructions: Include service accounts, admin accounts, and application accounts

privileged_users._comment: Users with privileged/administrative access (subset of authorized_users)
privileged_users._instructions: Only include accounts that need admin privileges

service_accounts._comment: Service accounts (non-human accounts for automated processes)

required_ssl_settings._comment: Minimum SSL/TLS requirements for your organization

client_certificate_enforced._comment: Require client certificates for mutual TLS (true/false)

audit_level._comment: Must be 'Custom' to enable selective auditing

all_events_enabled._comment: Audit all events (true) or selective events (false)

users_to_always_audit._comment: Users whose actions should ALWAYS be audited (privileged users)

audit_data_retention_days._comment: Number of days to retain audit data (NIST recommends 90+ days)

admin_console_timeout._comment: Admin console idle timeout. NIST recommends 15 minutes or less

auto_deployment_enabled._comment: Auto-deployment should be disabled in production (false)

production_mode._comment: Production mode should be enabled (true) for production systems

_customization_instructions.step1: Review your organization's security policies and STIG requirements
_customization_instructions.step2: Update 'organization' section with your org name and environment
_customization_instructions.step3: Customize approved/unauthorized protocols and ports for your environment
_customization_instructions.step4: Review and update cipher suites based on your crypto policies
_customization_instructions.step6: Configure SSL settings according to organizational requirements
_customization_instructions.step7: Set audit settings to meet compliance requirements
_customization_instructions.step8: Save this file and test with: python3 -m json.tool stig-config.json
_customization_instructions.step9: Use this config with checks: --config stig-config.json
